value:
How fascinating! If that's true, then—
Of course! Now, let me just see...$k$pOh! Don't mind me. I'm just caught up
in a book, as usual...

I am told that in this world dwells one
called a "summoner," who can call
forth Heroes from other realms...$k$pDo you think you might introduce us?

Don't think I haven't noticed how
tireless you are in patrolling the
castle...$k$pOverwork is no good for you,
however. Do not forget that
taking breaks is part of the job, too.

Have you considered reading as a
way to lift your spirits or clear your
mind?$k$pI have some recommendations. Take
this book—it's a well-crafted yarn, but
it's a light read, too.

The library here is truly a wonder...
So many volumes! I hope I never
have to leave...

I am Canas. I bring greetings to you
from $Nf.

Excellent! Each step brings me
closer to fundamental truths...

Ah, well. No more than average—
this time.

Further indication that I am
lacking in talent, I suppose...

Goodness! I can't help but
wonder what you're scheming...

What a fascinating place... Oh, but
where are my manners? I am Canas,
a simple scholar.

My apologies... I didn't even see you
there, with my nose buried in this
book...$k$pBut you must understand how
fascinating it is! Truly!$k$pYou want to know why I'm always
reading? You could say that I am
driven by curiosity...$k$pOnce I identify a topic of interest, I
must study it from every
angle.$k$pI do wonder, sometimes, where this
habit will take me...$k$pWhen I consider the fate that befell
my brothers, as they pushed the
limits of magical study, I...$k$pBut I must be honest with you. I
cannot control my thirst for
knowledge.$k$pIt is a flaw in my character. One could
even call it greed...$k$pThe short answer to your question is
this: For me, to read is to live.$k$pNow, while I have you here, perhaps
you could answer one of my
questions...$k$pObserve the pattern on this page. It
is totally unfamiliar to me—like
nothing from my realm. Tell me...
ええと
すみません…
うああっ！
面目ない…
I must see the other side.
Journey beyond the darkness.
This scares me.
This book is the key.
What a shame.
*sigh*
Ah, hello there. My name is Canas.
What? What? What is it? I must be in your way! I'm so sorry!

I read for the thrill of new knowledge.
This book is a rather fascinating
excursion.

I'm currently reading "Roland the Hero."
He was a hero who fought dragons a
long time ago.

To use this magic, I must invite the dark
forces within me. The temptation to submit
to the darkness...will be great.
The darkness took my brothers.
I somehow get the feeling that you could understand me.
Y-yes?
Oh, yes.
This book, you see...
